component.ingredient_statement:
EITHER: Allergen Ingredient: Skimmed MILK, Sugar, Cream (Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Whey Powder (Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Glucose Syrup, Stabilisers (Guar Gum, Carrageenan), Emulsifier (Mono- and Diglycerides of Fatty Acids), Flavouring.
OR: Allergen Ingredient: Reconstituted Skimmed MILK, Cream (Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Sugar, Allergen Ingredient: MILK Protein, Glucose Syrup, Allergen Ingredient: Skimmed MILK Powder, Stabilisers (Guar Gum, Carrageenan), Emulsifier (Mono- and Diglycerides of Fatty Acids), Flavouring.

EITHER: Sugar, Cocoa Butter, Allergen Ingredient: Skimmed MILK Powder, Cocoa Mass, Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Flour, Butter Fat (from Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Lactose and Proteins from Whey (from Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Whey Powder (from Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Rice Starch, Emulsifier (Sunflower Lecithin), Fruit and Vegetable Concentrates (Safflower, Radish, Black Carrot, Lemon, Hibiscus), Colours (Beetroot Red, Beta Carotene, Curcumin), Spirulina Concentrate, Glazing Agents (Carnauba Wax, Beeswax White), Allergen Ingredient: BARLEY Malt Extract, Flavourings.
OR: Sugar, Cocoa Butter, Allergen Ingredient: Skimmed MILK Powder, Cocoa Mass, Butterfat (from Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Flour, Lactose and Proteins from Whey (from Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Rice Starch, Emulsifier (Sunflower Lecithin), Fruit and Vegetable Concentrates (Safflower, Radish, Black Carrot, Lemon, Hibiscus), Spirulina Concentrate, Glazing Agents (Carnuba Wax, Beeswax White), Natural Vanilla Flavouring.
Potential Allergen Ingredient: N.B. May contain traces of soya.

item.description: Soft dairy ice cream swirled with crushed smarties.

footer.footer_name36: Allergy Advice: For allergens including cereals containing gluten see ingredients in BOLD
footer.footer_name41: We produce our food in kitchens where allergens are handled by our people, and where equipment and utensils are used for multiple menu items, including those containing allergens.  Although your meal is prepared with care, we cannot guarantee it will be allergen free, even after ingredients have been removed on request. While there are no nuts or peanut ingredients in the products listed we can’t guarantee that our food is completely nut or peanut free.

item.item_allergen: Gluten, Milk, Wheat, Barley|May also contain Soy.
